Software description computer studies society, online grading system is an system that that uses internet that allows faculty to manage class grades and submit grades.

Core Commitments

We built the best tools to elevate your marketing efforts.

The DepEd Vision

We dream of Filipinos who passionately love their country and whose values and competencies enable them to realize their full potential and contribute meaningfully to building the nation. As a learner-centered public institution, the Department of Education continuously improves itself to better serve its stakeholders.

The DepEd Core Values

Maka-Diyos
Maka-tao
Makakalikasan
Makabansa

The DepEd Mission

To protect and promote the right of every Filipino to quality, equitable, culture-based, and complete basic education where: Students learn in a child-friendly, gender-sensitive, safe, and motivating environment. Teachers facilitate learning and constantly nurture every learner. Administrators and staff, as stewards of the institution, ensure an enabling and supportive environment for effective learning to happen. Family, community, and other stakeholders are actively engaged and share responsibility for developing life-long learners.

How it works?

1. LOGIN/SIGNUP

This part generally displays as the face or very front of the system in order to access and modify any information within the system, it has Two part wherein log in with an account or sign up to create an account.

2. GENERAL DASHBOARD

Once you entered the system, dashboard is where you headed. On this part, you can clearly view the things that can generally see in any common dashboard. All the subjects that is undertaken by the students of the specified school are inside and written to record the things as their basis of their grades.

3. ADMINISTRATOR APPROVAL

After collecting all the data that is provided by the students and recorded by the teachers, the conclusion part is where the grade is being process. When the grade is in a final state, the administrator of the system will approve and confirm that the information is true and valid to be published to the students.
